name: Content Tracker for Notion | Simple but effective content and entertainment tracker
description: Content Tracker is a simple but effective content and entertainment tracker for Notion. Record and document books, audiobooks, articles, TV shows, movies, blogs, podcasts, guides, and more with the predesigned template. features: Leverage a predesigned content template for a clean look every time.; Record notes and details on everything you consume.; Categorize, rate, and link all your content and entertainment.; Sort by content type, genre, and status.; Access simplified data storage for custom adjustments.; Enjoy tips and tricks for easy use.
